General.Name: Univacco Technology
General.Description: Univacco Technology Inc. manufactures and sells stamping foil products and optoelectronics materials under the UNIVACCO brand worldwide. It offers various decorative and functional foils, including hot stamping, cold, holographic, and digital foils. The company also provides optoelectronics materials, including clean and PET protective films, adhesive SMD cover tape, medical films, and OEM for coating. It offers its products for wine, beer, and spirits label and packaging; food, drink, and confectionery label and packaging; tobacco/cigarette packaging; greeting cards and printed media; artificial leather book covers; personal care; cosmetics and perfumes; pharmaceuticals; and clothing and textile applications. The company was formerly known as Tai Leng Industry Co., Ltd and changed its name to Univacco Technology Inc. in 2002. Univacco Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.1-13, Makou Village, Tainan City, Taiwan, 721013
